GK22vidsrimu:4230: jihvādurvyasanair upadravarujaḥ kurvanti ye duḥsutās % tān dṛṣṭvārtham itas tato nikhanati svaṃ niḥsvam ātanvatī // VidSrk_50.20 *(1717) //.
GK22vidsrimu:4231: vallaṇasya aviditaguṇāpi satkavibhaṇitiḥ karṇeṣu vamati madhudhārām /*
GK22vidsrimu:4232: anadhigataparimalāpi hi harati dṛśaṃ mālatīmālā // VidSrk_50.21 *(1718)
GK22vidsrimu:4233: subandhoḥ babhūva valmīkabhavaḥ purā kavis $ tataḥ prapede bhuvi bhartṛmeṭhatām &
GK22vidsrimu:4234: punaḥ sthito yo bhavabhūtirekhayā % sa vartate samprati rājaśekharaḥ //
GK22vidsrimu:4236: kiṃ punar vikaṭāṭopa- % padabandhā sarasvatī // VidSrk_50.23 *(1720) //
GK22vidsrimu:4237: yallagnaṃ hṛdi puṃsāṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ śiro na ghūrṇayati /*
GK22vidsrimu:4238: tad api kaveḥ kim u kāvyaṃ kāṇḍo vā dhanvināṃ kim asau // VidSrk_50.24
GK22vidsrimu:4239: tāmarasasya kathaṃcit kālidāsasya $ kālena bahunā mayā &
GK22vidsrimu:4241: kaścid vācaṃ racayitum alaṃ śrotum evāparas tāṃ $ kalyāṇī te matur
GK22vidsrimu:4243: na hy ekasminn atiśayavatāṃ saṃnipāto guṇānām % ekaḥ sūte kanakam upalas tatparīkṣākṣamo 'nyaḥ kālidāsya||
GK22vidsrimu:4244: % NB Ingalls points out that the attribution to Kālidāsa is based % on a misunderstanding of the remarks with which Rājaśekhara
GK22vidsrimu:4245: % precedes his citation of the verse in the Kāvyamīmāṃsā.
GK22vidsrimu:4246: prayogavyutpattau pratipadaviśeṣārthakathane $ prasattau gāmbhīrye rasavati ca vākyārthaghaṭane
GK22vidsrimu:4247: agamyāyām anyair diśi pariṇateś cārthavacasor % mataṃ ced asmākaṃ kavir amarasiṃho vijayate śālikasya iyaṃ gaur uddāmā tava nibiḍabandhāpi hi kathaṃ $ na vaidarbhād anyat
GK22vidsrimu:4249: avandhyā ca khyātā bhuvi katham agamyā kavivṛṣaiḥ % kathaṃ vā pīyūṣaṃ
GK22vidsrimu:4251: śabdārṇavasya śailair bandhayati sma vānarahṛtair vālmīkir ambhonidhiṃ $ vyāsaḥ pārthaśarais tathāpi na tayor atyuktir udbhāvyate &
GK22vidsrimu:4252: vāgarthau ca tulādhṛtāv iva tathāpy asmin nibandhān ayaṃ % loko dūṣayati prasāritamukhas tubhyaṃ pratiṣṭhe namaḥ // VidSrk_50.29 *(1726) //.
GK22vidsrimu:4253: dharmakīrteḥ hā kaṣṭaṃ kavicakramaulimaṇinā dakṣeṇa yan nekṣitaḥ $ śrīmān utpalarājadevanṛpatir vidyāvadhūvallabhaḥ &
GK22vidsrimu:4254: tasyāpy arthijanaikarohaṇagirer lakṣmīr vṛthaivābhavad % dakṣasyāsya na yena sundaragiraḥ karṇāvataṃsīkṛtāḥ // VidSrk_50.30 *(1727) //.
GK22vidsrimu:4255: dakṣasya yasya yathā vijñānaṃ tādṛk tasyeha hṛdayasadbhāvaḥ /*
GK22vidsrimu:4256: unmīlati kavipuṅgavacane ca purāṇapuruṣe ca // VidSrk_50.31 *(1728) //*
GK22vidsrimu:4257: vahati na puraḥ kaścit paścān na ko 'py anuyāti māṃ $ na ca navapadakṣuṇṇo
GK22vidsrimu:4259: bhavati viditaṃ pūrvavyūḍho 'dhunā khilatāṃ gataḥ % sa khalu bahulo vāmaḥ panthā mayā sphuṭam urjitaḥ // VidSrk_50.32 *(1729) //.
GK22vidsrimu:4260: dharmakīrtipadānām vidyāvadhūm apariṇīya kulānurūpāṃ $ ślāghyāṃ sutām iva tataḥ śriyam aprasūya &
GK22vidsrimu:4261: tāṃ cārthine praṇayapeśalam apradāya % dhik taṃ manuṣyapadam ātmani yaḥ prayuṅkte // VidSrk_50.33 bhartṛhareḥ ye nāma kecid iha naḥ prathayanty avajñāṃ $ jānanti te kim api tān prati
GK22vidsrimu:4263: utpatsyate tu mama ko 'pi samānadharmā % kālo hy ayaṃ niravadhir vipulā ca
GK22vidsrimu:4266: nidhānaṃ vidyānāṃ kulagṛham apārasya yaśasaḥ $ śuci kṣmāpālānāṃ sucaritakathādarpaṇatalam
GK22vidsrimu:4267: kalāsampadratnavratativiṭapānāṃ surataruḥ % prakṛtyā gambhīraḥ kavir iha saśabdo vijayate unnīto bhavabhūtinā pratidinaṃ bāṇe gate yaḥ purā $ yaś cīrṇaḥ kamalāyudhena suciraṃ yenāgamat keśaṭaḥ &
GK22vidsrimu:4268: yaḥ śrīvākpatirājapādarajasāṃ samparkapūtaś ciraṃ % diṣṭyā ślāghaguṇasya kasyacid asau mārgaḥ samunmīlati // VidSrk_50.36 *(1733) //.
GK22vidsrimu:4270: viśrānto rasabhāgastimitayati yathā gabhīrimā ko 'pi // VidSrk_50.37
GK22vidsrimu:4272: jihvāntaḥ kṛṣyamāṇeva % na kavitve pragalbhate // VidSrk_50.38 *(1735) //
GK22vidsrimu:4273: bāṇasya vālmīker mukulīkṛtaiva kavitā kaḥ stotum asty ādaro $ vaiyāsāni vacāṃsi bhāravigirāṃ bhūtaiva nirbhartsanā &
GK22vidsrimu:4274: kāvyaṃ ced avataṃsabhūpam abhajad dharmāyaṇaṃ karṇayos % tātaḥ kiṃ bahu
GK22vidsrimu:4278: yāvac ca pratisāmasāraṇavidhivyagrau karau brahmaṇaḥ % stheyāsuḥ śrutiśuktilehyamadhavas tāvat satāṃ sūktayaḥ // VidSrk_50.40 *(1737) //.
GK22vidsrimu:4279: kīrtyā samaṃ tridivavāsam upasthitānāṃ $ martyāvatīrṇamarutām api satkavīnām &
GK22vidsrimu:4280: jagrantha durlabhasubhāṣitaratnakoṣaṃ % vidyākaraḥ sukṛtikaṇṭhavibhūṣaṇāya // VidSrk_50.41 /Colo iti kavivarṇanavrajyā samāptā||
